title: (x) Valle Monte League Inc. - (similar to) French Script {Patricia}
content:
I was wondering if anybody could identify this font here:   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516224548im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/41814.gif)   
   
The closest I have come is Riveara Script:   
   
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/atriviera-script/atriviera-script/testdrive.html?s=Valle+Monte+League+Inc.&p=60](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516224548/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/atriviera-script/atriviera-script/testdrive.html?s=Valle%2BMonte%2BLeague%2BInc.&p=60)   
   
This font isn't an exact match and it is hollow.   
   
Any help would be appreciated.   
   
Thanks!
author: antiphrasis

comments.content: Typo Upright (or Linoscript), Redonda and Redonda Fancy, are French Ronde scripts that are similar, but not identical, to your sample.
[French Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516224548/http:/www.fonts.com/findfonts/detail.asp?pid=203226) looks pretty close to me. The V and the L are different but the feel is similar.
